p.codeblock: public abstract int enableContentInspect(boolean enabled, ContentInspectConfig config);
virtual int enableContentInspect(bool enabled, const media::ContentInspectConfig &config) = 0;
public abstract int EnableContentInspect(bool enabled, ContentInspectConfig config);

section.p: When video content moderation is enabled, the SDK takes screenshots, reviews, and uploads videos sent by local users based on the type and frequency of the content inspection module you set in . After content moderation, the Agora content moderation server sends the results to your app server in HTTPS requests and sends all screenshots to the third-party cloud storage service.
If you set the type in to video content moderation, after the moderation is completed, the SDK triggers the callback and report the moderation result.
section.note: Before calling this method, ensure that the Agora content moderation service has been enabled. Contact <xref keyref="mailto-link"/> to enable the service.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable video content moderation.
: Enable video content moderation.
: Disable video content moderation.
Configuration of video content moderation. See .
